archetype_name: Family Low-Sodium American & French Comfort (30–60, Mild)
name: Chicken Tarragon Braise with Creamy Polenta and Lemon Green Beans
description: A family-friendly French-American stovetop and oven braise of chicken thighs with mushrooms, shallots, and tarragon, served over creamy polenta with bright lemony green beans. Built for low-sodium cooking with herb and citrus balance.
prep_steps: Pat dry 6–8 chicken thighs with paper towels.
Slice 8 oz mushrooms and 2 shallots; mince 2 cloves garlic.
Chop 2 tbsp tarragon (reserve some leaves for garnish).
Trim 12 oz green beans; halve 1 lemon.
Measure liquids: 1/2 cup white wine, 1 cup vegetable stock, 3 cups water, 1 cup milk, 1/3 cup creme fraiche.
Set out 1 cup polenta, 2 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp olive oil, and black pepper.
cook_steps: Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in an oven-safe sauté pan over medium-high. Add chicken thighs, skin-side down if skin-on, and sear 4–5 minutes per side until browned. Transfer to a plate.
Lower heat to medium. Add 1 tsp olive oil if pan is dry, then sauté shallots 2 minutes. Add mushrooms and cook 4–5 minutes until lightly browned. Stir in garlic for 30 seconds.
Pour in white wine and simmer 1 minute, scraping browned bits. Add vegetable stock, half the tarragon, a few grinds of black pepper, and return chicken to the pan (skin-side up).
Transfer pan to oven and braise 15–20 minutes until chicken is cooked through.

While chicken braises, bring 3 cups water and 1 cup milk to a gentle boil in a saucepan. Whisk in 1 cup polenta. Reduce to low and cook, whisking often, 12–15 minutes until creamy. Stir in 2 tbsp butter and 1/2 cup parmesan cheese. Season with black pepper to taste; keep warm on low.
Bring a pot of water to a boil. Add green beans and cook 3–4 minutes until crisp-tender. Drain well.
In the empty pot, warm 1 tsp olive oil over low. Add green beans, squeeze in juice from half the lemon, and add a pinch of black pepper; toss 30 seconds. Set aside.

Remove chicken pan from oven. Stir in creme fraiche and remaining tarragon; simmer on stovetop 1–2 minutes to slightly thicken. Squeeze in remaining lemon half to taste and add black pepper if desired.
Plate polenta, top with chicken and mushroom-tarragon sauce, and serve with lemon green beans. Garnish with reserved tarragon.

ingredients.preparation: chopped, plus extra leaves for garnish
